Lure.name: Lure
Lure.description: A product category for fishing lures.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique identifier assigned to a specific lure model.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The name of the brand that manufactures the lure.

attributes.name: Weight
attributes.description: The weight of the lure in grams.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used to make the lure.

attributes.name: Length
attributes.description: The length of the lure in centimeters.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the lure.

attributes.name: Lure Type
attributes.description: The type or category of the lure.

attributes.name: Position
attributes.description: The recommended fishing position for using the lure.

attributes.name: Action
attributes.description: The action or movement of the lure in water.

attributes.name: Item
attributes.description: The specific item or variant of the lure.

attributes.name: Quantity
attributes.description: The number of lures included in a package or set.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The size of the lure, usually measured in length or weight.

Baseball Caps.name: Baseball Caps
Baseball Caps.description: Baseball caps are a type of headwear commonly worn in sports and casual settings.

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: Pattern refers to the design or print on the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: Brand Name indicates the manufacturer or company that produces the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: Gender specifies the intended audience for the baseball cap, whether it is for men, women, or unisex.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: Style describes the overall aesthetic or fashion of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: Material refers to the fabric or material used in the construction of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Department Name
attributes.description: Department Name indicates the specific department or category the baseball cap belongs to within a store or brand.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: Model Number is a unique identifier assigned to a specific baseball cap model.

Swimwear.name: Swimwear
Swimwear.description: Swimwear is a category of clothing designed to be worn while swimming or engaging in water-based activities.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: The pattern or design of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The gender for which the swimwear product is designed.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number assigned to the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style or cut of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Special features or characteristics of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A detailed description of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Season
attributes.description: The season or time of year the swimwear product is suitable for.

Helmet.name: Helmet
Helmet.description: Protective headgear worn by people engaged in sports or other activities.

attributes.name: Sport
attributes.description: The specific sport or activity for which the helmet is designed.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The substance or substances used to make the helmet.

attributes.name: Applicable People
attributes.description: The target group or individuals for whom the helmet is suitable.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The name of the brand that manufactures the helmet.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Distinctive characteristics or functionalities of the helmet.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The aesthetic design or appearance of the helmet.

attributes.name: Season
attributes.description: The specific season or weather conditions for which the helmet is suitable.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique identifier assigned to a particular helmet model.

attributes.name: Head Circumference
attributes.description: The measurement of the circumference of the head for which the helmet is designed.

Shirts.name: Shirts
Shirts.description: A category of clothing items that are worn on the upper body.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The type of sport for which the shirt is designed.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for wearing the shirt.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The name of the brand that manufactures the shirt.

attributes.name: Sleeve Length(cm)
attributes.description: The length of the sleeves of the shirt in centimeters.

attributes.name: Fabric Type
attributes.description: The type of fabric used in making the shirt.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number assigned to the shirt.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The primary material used in making the shirt.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: A notable feature or characteristic of the shirt.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The overall style or design of the shirt.

Fishing Rod.name: Fishing Rod
Fishing Rod.description: A product category for fishing rods.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used to make the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The model number of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Section
attributes.description: The number of sections the fishing rod has.

attributes.name: Hardness
attributes.description: The hardness level of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Power
attributes.description: The power rating of the fishing rod.

Eyewear.name: Eyewear
Eyewear.description: Eyewear is a category of products that are worn on the face to protect the eyes or for fashion purposes.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The specific sport or activity for which the eyewear is designed.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for which the eyewear is designed.

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: The unique name or model of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Lens Height
attributes.description: The vertical measurement of the eyewear lens.

attributes.name: Lens Width
attributes.description: The horizontal measurement of the eyewear lens.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The specific model number assigned to the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Frame Material
attributes.description: The material used for the frame of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Lenses Optical Attribute
attributes.description: The specific optical attribute of the eyewear lenses.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand or manufacturer of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: A notable feature or characteristic of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Function
attributes.description: The intended function or purpose of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Frame Color
attributes.description: The color of the frame of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Lenses Material
attributes.description: The material used for the lenses of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Lenses Color
attributes.description: The color of the lenses of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The specific style or design of the eyewear product.

attributes.name: Eyewear Type
attributes.description: The general type or category of the eyewear product.

Guitar.name: Guitar
Guitar.description: A musical instrument with various attributes used for playing melodies and chords.

attributes.name: Back / Side Material
attributes.description: The material used for the back and sides of the guitar body.

attributes.name: Body Material
attributes.description: The material used for the guitar body.

attributes.name: Fingerboard Material
attributes.description: The material used for the fingerboard of the guitar.

attributes.name: Pickup
attributes.description: A device used to capture the sound of the guitar and convert it into an electrical signal.

attributes.name: Tone Position
attributes.description: The position on the guitar where the tone can be adjusted.

attributes.name: Bow Material
attributes.description: The material used for the bow of a guitar bow.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The name of the brand that manufactures the guitar.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique identifier assigned to a specific guitar model.

attributes.name: String Winder
attributes.description: A tool used for winding and unwinding the strings of a guitar.

Shorts.name: Shorts
Shorts.description: Comfortable and stylish shorts for various activities.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The type of sport or activity the shorts are designed for.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for wearing the shorts.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number of the shorts.

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: The pattern or design on the shorts.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the shorts.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Special features or functionalities of the shorts.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style or cut of the shorts.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used to make the shorts.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the shorts.

attributes.name: Fabric Type
attributes.description: The type of fabric used in the shorts.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A detailed description of the shorts.

attributes.name: Item
attributes.description: The specific item or product variant of the shorts.

Stove.name: Stove
Stove.description: Stove is a product category that includes various types of stoves used for cooking or heating purposes.

attributes.name: Fuel
attributes.description: Fuel is the type of substance used to power the stove, such as gas, electric, or wood.

attributes.name: Stove Type
attributes.description: Stove Type refers to the specific design or style of the stove, such as freestanding, built-in, or portable.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: Brand Name is the name of the company or manufacturer that produces the stove.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: Material refers to the substance or combination of substances used to construct the stove, such as stainless steel, cast iron, or ceramic.

attributes.name: Applicable Seasoning Type
attributes.description: Applicable Seasoning Type indicates the type of seasoning or fuel additive that can be used with the stove, such as charcoal, pellets, or propane.

attributes.name: Model
attributes.description: Model is the specific product model or number assigned to the stove by the manufacturer.
